amendatorysection.catchline: Counties and municipalities; contract between themselves.
amendatorysection.para: In order to achieve the efficiencies and economics resulting from unified operations, the Legislature encourages the counties and municipalities to make use of the Interlocal Cooperation Act or the Joint Public Agency Act by contracting between and among themselves for cooperative programs of administering all phases of their road and street programs.

crossreference.para: Joint Public Agency Act, see section 13-2501.
